descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

webinarKey.name: webinarKey
webinarKey.description: Key of the webinar to update
webinarKey.ai_hint: Key of the webinar to update

registrantKey.name: registrantKey
registrantKey.description: Key of the registrant to retrieve
registrantKey.ai_hint: Key of the registrant to retrieve

details.name: details

options.name: Performance
options.description: Performance details for a webinar session

options.name: Polls
options.description: Questions and answers for polls from a webinar session

options.name: Questions
options.description: Questions and answers for a past webinar session

options.name: Surveys
options.description: Surveys for a past webinar session

details.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

isExternal.name: isExternal
isExternal.description: Whether the co-organizer has no GoToWebinar account

organizerKey.name: organizerKey
organizerKey.description: The co-organizer's organizer key for the webinar
organizerKey.ai_hint: The co-organizer's organizer key for the webinar

email.name: email
email.description: Email address of the registrant to create
email.ai_hint: Email address of the registrant to create

coorganizerKey.name: coorganizerKey
coorganizerKey.description: Key of the co-organizer to reinvite
coorganizerKey.ai_hint: Key of the co-organizer to reinvite

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the panelist to create
name.ai_hint: Name of the panelist to create

panelistKey.name: panelistKey
panelistKey.description: Key of the panelist to reinvite
panelistKey.ai_hint: Key of the panelist to reinvite

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.description: First name of the registrant to create
firstName.ai_hint: First name of the registrant to create

lastName.name: lastName
lastName.description: Last name of the registrant to create
lastName.ai_hint: Last name of the registrant to create

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

values.name: fromTime
values.description: Start of the datetime range for the webinar

values.name: toTime
values.description: End of the datetime range for the webinar

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

times.name: times
times.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: isOnDemand
options.description: Whether the webinar may be watched anytime

options.name: isPasswordProtected
options.description: Whether the webinar requires a password for attendees to join

options.name: subject
options.description: Name or topic of the webinar

options.name: timezone
options.description: Timezone where the webinar is to take place. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: Series
options.description: Webinar with multiple meetings times where attendees choose only one to attend

options.name: Sequence
options.description: Webinar with multiple meeting times where attendees are expected to be the same for all sessions

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'attendee' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'attendee' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'attendee' THEN SHOW parameter 'sessionKey'
IF resource == 'attendee' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'registrantKey'
IF resource == 'attendee' AND operation == 'getDetails' THEN SHOW parameter 'registrantKey'
IF resource == 'attendee' AND operation == 'getDetails' THEN SHOW parameter 'details'
IF resource == 'attendee' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'attendee' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'isExternal'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' AND operation == 'create' AND isExternal == False THEN SHOW parameter 'organizerKey'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' AND operation == 'create' AND isExternal == True THEN SHOW parameter 'givenName'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' AND operation == 'create' AND isExternal == True THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'coorganizerKey'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'isExternal'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' AND operation == 'reinvite' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' AND operation == 'reinvite' THEN SHOW parameter 'coorganizerKey'
IF resource == 'coorganizer' AND operation == 'reinvite' THEN SHOW parameter 'isExternal'
IF resource == 'panelist' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'panelist' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'panelist' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'panelist' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'panelist' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'panelist' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'panelist' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'panelist' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'panelist' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'panelistKey'
IF resource == 'panelist' AND operation == 'reinvite' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'panelist' AND operation == 'reinvite' THEN SHOW parameter 'panelistKey'
IF resource == 'registrant' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'registrant' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'registrant' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'firstName'
IF resource == 'registrant' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'lastName'
IF resource == 'registrant' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'registrant' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'registrant' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'registrant' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'registrant' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'registrant' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'registrant' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'registrantKey'
IF resource == 'registrant' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'registrant' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'registrantKey'
IF resource == 'session' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation IN ["get", "getDetails"] THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation IN ["get", "getDetails"] THEN SHOW parameter 'sessionKey'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'getDetails' THEN SHOW parameter 'details'
IF resource == 'webinar' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'webinar' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'subject'
IF resource == 'webinar' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'times'
IF resource == 'webinar' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'webinar' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'webinar' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'webinar' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'webinar' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'webinar' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'webinar' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'webinar' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'webinarKey'
IF resource == 'webinar' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'notifyParticipants'
IF resource == 'webinar' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
